name: HI-SCORE
description:
RESCUE THE UNIVERSE BY DESTROYING MOST OF IT!

Code : Mika "Misfit" Keränen

Music : 8-bits high

Choose any of the 3 Rad pilots and help save the whole Universe. Hi-Energy, Fast action game play..

HI-SCORE is an official "8-bits high" game.  Buy the album!

If you want to buy a tape release The Future Was 8 Bit
